Get Started
Our Team
🚀

Instant App Generation

Start from zero and launch a fully functional app in under 5 minutes. No boilerplate. Just magic.

🔁

CI/CD Without the Headaches

Rock simplifies continuous integration and deployment — no YAML files or DevOps experience required.

🎨

Drag & Drop Interface

Design your app visually — add buttons, forms, or entire modules with a simple drag. No coding skills needed.

🔌

Built-in Integrations

Connect instantly to Firebase, Stripe, GitHub, DockerHub and more — all without leaving the platform.

⚙️

AI-Driven Backend

Rock auto-generates backend code and cloud functions based on your app’s structure. You focus on features — Rock handles the plumbing.

🌍

Multi-language & RTL Support

Reach global users with built-in internationalization, including RTL layout for Hebrew, Arabic and more.

🔒

Enterprise-grade Security

Every app includes auth, role-based access control, rate limiting, and secure CI/CD pipelines.

Why Choose Rock? ​

Rock isn’t just another app generator — it’s your CI/CD companion for fast, scalable, beautiful applications.

  • Focus on what your app does — not how to build and deploy it
  • Eliminate DevOps complexity with instant CI/CD pipelines
  • Scale confidently with clean, production-ready code
  • Customize endlessly with built-in Vite, Vue, and plugins

What Users Say
